description:
Summer is made for swimming in the sea! The students of Asahigaoka Branch School take a trip to the beach together.
As Renge and Natsumi play in their swimsuits, Komari neither swims nor changes into her swimsuit, but only gazes out at the ocean. Then Hotaru shows up in a rather bold bikini...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Pretended I Forgot My Swimsuit
Ich habe so getan, als hätte ich meinen Badeanzug vergessen
Mizugi o Wasureta Furi o Shita
水着を忘れたふりをした
